title: 2022 NBA Draft Preview, Kyrie Wants Out?
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN's Kevin Pelton to talk the logistics of where Kyrie could go outside of Brooklyn and the chances he remains with the Nets. Plus, the guys get you ready for Thursday’s NBA Draft with who could go #1 and some players who will greatly outperform their selection.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Kyrie Logistics, NBA Draft Prospects Who Are Undervalued
